name: 2nd International Forum on Nanotechnology and Applications
content: It is with great pleasure that we welcome all the researchers in the field of Nanoscience and Technology to the 2nd International Forum on Nanotechnology and Applications (NANOFORUM2024), which will be held in Budapest, Hungary during November 18-20, 2024\. This conference will include a diverse array of multidisciplinary talks aimed at connecting world-leading scientists, students, engineers, industry participants, entrepreneurs, and business professionals working in the field of nanoscale science and technology to discuss exciting new developments. The forum has featured plenary talks, keynote talks, special sessions, poster presentations, workshops, and contributed papers each year.
